name: Smart Mouth Mobile
tag_list: smart-mouth-mobile, voip, best-sip-phone, unlimited-text, iphone-wifi-phone, free-calls, ipod-to-iphone, iphone-mobile-voip, mobile-communications, wireless-communications, app-developer
overview:
Smart Mouth Mobile is a division of Smarter Apps, a Las Vegas based communications company and mobile application developer. The company has just launched three communications apps in the month of June of 2011 and are very soon releasing a service to allow unlimited international calling from any device.

With the social networking and communications app from Smart Mouth Mobile, Smart Mobile, and Smart Mouth Kids Mobile you can even turn your iPod Touch into a phone!
